//mainactivity logout Your profile Email not verified! Verify Email home Open navigation drawer Close navigation drawer Android Studio android.studio@android.com Navigation header Settings Please Click on verify email to move further.
 If you didn't get verification email 
 click on verify email button or check your spam folder.
 Once you verify the email kindly press the 
 logout button and login again.
//bookingpage Fullname (First name & Last name) 10 digit phone number 6 Digit pincode Flat No,Bldg Name,Company,Apartment Area, Colony, Street, Sector, Village Landmark Town,City,Village State book //bookinghispage Booking History Edit Enter The Pickup Details Enter The Destination Details Your Pickup Details Your Destination Details Cancel Delete No Booking History! Go to Booking Page To Start Booking..
TempoWala Logout Home Page BOOK NOW Booking History Join us Please fill this application to join our service.
After you click on submit,
We will review your application and call you,
Once it has been approved. Faq Click on one of the following: 12 digit Aadhaar number Driving License number Frequently Asked Questions Click on the Questions: Your application is already submitted.
Once it has been approved we will call you.
Thanks,
Team TempoWala. No Booking History.
Go to Booking Page! To Start Booking. Q1) Fare Charges? The Fare System is subject to changes
Please Confirm the price with our employee on call after placing order. 
	*Approximate* 
|--Km-|----Rs----| 
|---1----|---500---| 
|---2----|---700---|+200 
|---3----|---900---|+200 
|---4----|--1100--|+200 
|---5----|--1400--|200+100 (5km +100) 
|---6----|--1700--|+300 
|---7----|--2000--|+300 
|---8----|--2300--|+300 
|---9----|--2600--|+300 
|---10--|--3000--|300+100 (5km +100) Q2) How to Book? Ans) On the Home Page click on Book Now Button.
Then Fill the details and click on Book Button.
Congratulations! You have Booked Your First Tempo. Q3) How to check your Bookings? Ans) On the homepage click on Booking History
You will be able to see your booking history. Q4) How to Edit/Cancel booking? Ans) On the homepage click on Booking History.
Scroll down to see Edit & Cancel buttons. Q5) What happens after booking is successful? Ans) After a booking is successful,
We recieve the details you entered.
An employee then calls on your Number,
To Assist with further procedure. Q6) How to pay? Ans) You can pay by Cash on Delivery, once your order is completed. Q7) Having a tempo,How to join? Ans) To join us simply click on the Join Us button from Home Page.
Fill in required details and click on submit.
Once submitted We will Review your Application.
Once Approved we will call you to discuss further.
